Document Layout¶

This module provides utilities to control document and text layout.

class simpletex.formatting.layout.Centering(inline=False)[source]¶

Bases: simpletex.base.Environment

Centers all contents. Equivalent to the LaTeX ‘center’ environment.

class simpletex.formatting.layout.Columns(number)[source]¶

Bases: simpletex.base.Environment

Formats contents into columns. Equivalent to the LaTeX ‘multicols’ environment.

number
: int
The number of columns to use.
